data.title: Phoenix Suns Roster
data.meta_description: Phoenix Suns scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Earl Clark was selected as the #14 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Phoenix Suns. Earl Clark signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns on July 10, 2009.

Taylor Griffin was selected as the #18 pick in the Second Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Phoenix Suns. Taylor Griffin signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns on August 17, 2009.

Robin Lopez was selected as the #15 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft by the Phoenix Suns. Robin Lopez signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns on July 3, 2008.

Amar'e Stoudemire was selected as the #9 pick in the First Round of the 2002 NBA Draft by the Phoenix Suns. Amar'e Stoudemire signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns on July 5, 2002. Amar'e Stoudemire signed a multi-year extension with the Phoenix Suns on October 3, 2005.

Draft Rights to Leandro Barbosa, the #28 pick in the First Round of the 2003 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Phoenix Suns from the San Antonio Spurs on June 26, 2003. Leandro Barbosa signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns on July 16, 2003. Leandro Barbosa signed a multi-year extension with the Phoenix Suns on August 4, 2006.

Draft Rights to Goran Dragic, the #15 pick in the Second Round of the 2008 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Phoenix Suns from the San Antonio Spurs on June 26, 2008. Goran Dragic signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns on September 22, 2008.

Lou Amundson signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Phoenix Suns on August 14, 2008.

Channing Frye signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Phoenix Suns on July 14, 2009.

Grant Hill signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns on July 11, 2007. Grant Hill re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Phoenix Suns on July 13, 2009.

Dwayne Jones signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Phoenix Suns on April 5, 2010.

Steve Nash signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns on July 14, 2004. Steve Nash re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Phoenix Suns on July 27, 2009.
